# Warren Reservoir

| rivers      = South Para River
| date-built  = 1914
| pushpin_map = South Australia
| area        =
| volume      =
| reference   =
}}
The Warren Reservoir is a water storage facility created by a dam on the South Para River in the Mount Lofty Ranges, South Australia. It is located a few kilometres south of Williamstown on the Birdwood road. Constructed between 1914 and 1916, the reservoir features various trails and recreational activities in its surrounding area.
